attributes.action: STOP USING POLONIUM-210 IN FERTILIZERS USED TO GROW FOOD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Polonium-210 also known as Radium F, the substance that killed Alexander Litvinenko, found in tobacco & vegetables. People are unaware Radioactive Polonium-210 contained in phosphate fertilizers is absorbed by the roots of plants & stored in its tissues. Polonium-210 can affect the body's lymph nodes, liver & tissues. Effects are more common in the kidney & the spleen. When polonium-210 is inhaled, it can come to rest on the mucous lining of the breathing tract. When you breathe out, polonium-210 can damage the cells lining the airways. This could lead to lung cancer over time. The primary means of exposure are ingesting food & water containing Polonium-210 & inhaling polonium-contaminated dust. Inhalation is of particular concern in the vicinity of a source of airborne dust, such as a phosphate plant & in areas of high radon concentrations.
Costs cannot be used to justify using Polonium-210, alternative safer fertilizers should be used, nor are they expensive & the government should be implementing these to protect human live & banning Radioactive Polonium-210 to be used.
How can you put a price on human lives?
